thread.title: SportsDay's Big 12 Defensive Player of the Week (10/5): Oklahoma LB Jordan Evans ices win over Mountaineers
thread.title_full: SportsDay's Big 12 Defensive Player of the Week (10/5): Oklahoma LB Jordan Evans ices win over Mountaineers | Dallas Morning News

author: Shehan Jeyarajah
title: SportsDay's Big 12 Defensive Player of the Week (10/5): Oklahoma LB Jordan Evans ices win over Mountaineers
text:
Big 12 Defensive Player of the Week
Jordan Evans, Oklahoma LB
Height: 6-foot-2
Weight: 239 pounds
Class: Senior
Season stats: 32 tackles, 2.5 TFLs, 1 sack, fumble recovery, TD
Why he deserves it: Evans has played well at linebacker since taking over last season and had a stellar game against No. 23 West Virginia in Norman. Evans finished second on the team with nine tackles and added two tackles for loss and a sack. Most important, Evans recovered a fumble from West Virginia QB Skyler Howard and returned it 41 yards for a touchdown. The score, which occurred early in the fourth quarter, pushed Oklahoma's lead to 17 points and effectively killed the Mountaineers' chances of coming back. Oklahoma eventually won 44-24 to move into the top 10 of the Associated Press poll.
Honorable mention: LB Montrel Wilson , TCU (13 tackles, 1.5 TFLs, 1 sack); S Denzel Johnson , TCU (5 tackles, 1.5 TFLs, PBU, QB hurry); S Orion Stewart, Baylor (10 tackles, forced fumble, fumble recovery); LB Eric Striker, Oklahoma (9 tackles, 3 TFLs, 2 sacks, FF); LB Taylor Young , Baylor (8 tackles, 7 solo, 2.0 TFLs)
